text: Roger Kynard "Roky" Erickson (July 15, 1947 â€“ May 31, 2019) was an American singer-songwriter, harmonica player, and guitarist. He was born in Austin, Texas. He was a founding member of The 13th Floor Elevators and a known musician of the psychedelic rock genre. Erickson died on May 31, 2019 at his home in Austin at the age of 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * Austin Chronicle article (12/05) * Roky Erickson FAQ * Roky Erickson / 13th Floor Elevators Extensive Discography * Thirteenth Floor Elevators Discography * [ Roky Erickson on AllMusic.com] Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:Writers from Austin, Texas Category:Singers from Austin, Texas Category:Musicians from Austin, Texas
title: Roky Erickson
